title: Alexandra Ash - Truth
description: Alexandra Ash is a DEA Special Forces Lieutenant. She is determined, independent, cold and standoffish. After losing the love of her life, Alex is thrown deep undercover to unlock the secrets of a drug smuggling operation and take down the leader. While she acquires the trust of her beautiful asset Natalie Manson, she realized that she may have gone too deep. So deep, she has to reevaluate what side she’s on, and if she really wants to be there… As the truth starts to come to light, she learns what really happened to the love of her life two years ago, and who her asset Natalie really is. She’s faced with a harsh reality once more.Will she lose the woman that truly loves her…?Will the truth set her free…?
author: Alexie H.
